Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Fish Notify
Description: Plays a sound when a fish is caught, depending on tug-strength
Punchline: Plays a sound when a fish is caught

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: RetainerTrack
Description:
Keeps track of who a retainer belongs to - if you have seen the retainer's owner locally (if you were on the same party, or if you have seen an item crafted by them).

Tracking is unavailable if the crafter isn't the retainer owner (to avoid resellers being attributed incorrectly), and if the tooltip says 'Obtaining Signature'.
Punchline: Track who a retainer belongs to.
Changelog:
v5.0 (2024-11-24)
- API 11

v4.3 (2024-07-16)
- Fix load error

v4.2 (2024-07-16)
- Add /accountid command
- use AccountId/ContentId properties from clientstructs instead of custom mapping

v4.1 (2024-07-04)
- Performance optimization

v4.0 (2024-07-02)
- API 10
- Remove LiteDB support

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Discard Helper
Description: Small plugin to help keep your inventory organized (especially when automating retainers or submersibles) by discarding items you don't want (e.g. Stuffed Alphas)
Punchline: Discard items automatically via a command or as a post-venture task for AutoRetainer
Changelog:
v7.0 (2024-11-18)

v6.3 (2024-11-09)

- Add collectables to discardable items
- Update dependencies

v6.2 (2024-07-19)
- Automatically adjust max gear item level based on the highest ilvl green item

v6.1 (2024-07-05)
- Fix discard confirmation window when playing on non-English clients

v6.0 (2024-07-02)
- API 10

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Questionable
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream
Changelog:
v4.20 (2025-02-22)
- Add BossMod (VBM) integration for running quest battles (beta)
- Updated BossMod preset used when using it as a combat module, thanks to xan_
- Fix a few ARR/post-ARR/HW paths
- Fix Crystal Tower alliance raids not directly picking up the next quest
- Fix interactions such as talking to NPCs sometimes not handling 'Action cancelled, you are under attack' properly
- Fix an issue which would prevent new versions of Questionable from loading on CN
- Stop Questionable if it detects that you're in an instance (e.g. dungeon, trial, raid) with other humans, to fix specific, rare issues

The following quest battles work in v4.20 out of the box:
- ARR for all three starting cities
- ARR shared main scenario quest (excluding Lv27-Lv46)
- post-ARR main scenario
- Heavensward main scenario (excluding one Lv50 instance, excluding post-HW)

Quest Battle notes:
- That this feature works is in large part due to xan_ on the VBM side; almost all of the relevant code is handled by VBM
- Individual battles can be enabled/disabled in the configuration, which will also list relevant issues
- The list of 'enabled'/'disabled + with issues' has been reviewed by me personally, which takes some time, hence why not all quest battles are currently included in this beta version
- BossMod will always be used for combat, no matter which combat module you've configured
- In its current WIP state, BossMod forks are very unlikely to work/be compatible, if you're using e.g. Reborn please wait for the final version of this feature
- A few quests are currently mis-configured, you can't enable quest battles for: 
  - 'Doing It the Bard Way' (BRD Lv45)
  - 'Requiem for the Fallen' (BRD Lv50)
  - 'Slave to the Code' (ROG Lv15)
  - 'What She Always Wanted' (WHM Lv70)
- Some quest battles (e.g. for some Lv90 role quests) are also unsupported, because their Quests haven't been added in Questionable

v4.19 (2025-02-07)
- Work around for an AutoDuty issue where having selected e.g. 'Trial' or 'Raid' as duty mode before entering a dungeon could put you into duty finder instead of duty support
- When Questionable is doing a dungeon via AutoDuty for you, pressing 'Stop' in the Questionable window also stops AutoDuty
- Add `Questionable.StartQuest`, `Questionable.StartSingleQuest` and `Questionable.GetCurrentlyActiveEventQuests` IPC methods, thanks to croizat

v4.18 (2025-02-05)
- Add 'I Promise You a Rose Garden' Valentione's Day quest, thanks to Starr
- Add Endwalker Physical Ranged role quests, partially thanks to Redacted
- Add 'Tales from the Shadows' quest, thanks to Redacted
- Add 'Tales of Newfound Adventure' quests, thanks to Redacted
- Add a few Namazu/Vath/Vanu Vanu quests, thanks to Redacted

v4.17 (2025-02-02)
- Add Dwarves daily quests, thanks to pot0to
- Add Namazu daily quests, thanks to Theo
- Fixes to Vath & Dwarves quests, thanks to Theo
- Small tweaks to schema layout to make certain conditions more explicit/understandable for some specific IDE versions

v4.16 (2025-01-25)
The previous testing versions (v4.14 and v4.15) were mostly to see if the new way to handle being interrupted during interactions etc. is working, and it appears to catch a lot more cases than the previous logic. Additionally, killing regular overworld enemies for quests (that are always on the map, and not quest spawns) should involve much less waiting.

There's been too many other changes to list here, so please feel free to look at the changelogs for v4.14 and v4.15 for additional details.

In addition to that, here's the changes since the last testing version:

- Add post-Dawntrail Role Quests
- Add Yanxia quests to unlock the Namazu + Namazu dailies, thanks to Theo
- Use Vesper Bay aetheryte tickets when the next MSQ is 'Operation Archon' (Lv49, after the last quest before that was Lv46) and you're no longer in the Waking Sands
- Add an optional teleport before talking to Raubahn in 'Rock the Castrum' so that level 50 class quests for your current job will be done before Castrum Meridianum
- Open all level 50 gear coffers from job quests + the level 49 weapon coffer (if available) before qeueing for Castrum Meridianum
- When using AutoDuty to queue for dungeons, make sure the item level calculation actually respects equipping recommended gear
- Automatically close prompts for when your job bar updates
- Optimization for some ARR MSQ paths (extra waypoints, etc.)
- Fix pathing in Southern Thanalan in 'Legacy of Allag'
- Fix target switching logic in combat
- Fix logic for using items on the Spotted Mudpuppy in 'Factual Folklore'
- AutoDuty: Mark Haukke Manor and Brayflox's Longstop as not enabled by default
